EmailTemplate.description: Manufacturers for DuPont™ NOMEX® & KEVLAR® Firefighter Fabrics and Fire ER Apparel
EmailTemplate.name: DPS - Manufacturers for Firefighter Fabrics and Fire ER Apparel
EmailTemplate.subject: Manufacturers for DuPont™ NOMEX® & KEVLAR® Firefighter Fabrics
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Lead.Salutation} {!Lead.FirstName} {!Lead.LastName},
Thank you for your interest in Nomex®.
DuPont makes the Nomex® and Kevlar® fiber. We have customers that take our fiber to manufacture Nomex®/ Kevlar® apparel for firefighters and manufacture Nomex®/ Kevlar® for firefighter fabrics. (To view the web address, cut and paste the web address below into your browser.)
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=8&prodNum=8
http://www2.dupont.com/NOWApp/DPPRequestGateway/sales/dl/?command=VCDealerByProductStates&prodId=9&prodNum=9
DuPont Protection Solutions
This source list is designed to present a representative group of suppliers. It may not necessarily include all the companies selling or making these products and is subject to revision at any time. It is not an endorsement of any specific manufacturer.
